revised_title: Ship Technology in the 1980s: Challenges and Opportunities
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities in ship technology during the 1980s. It highlights the importance of a close match between commercial requirements and technological means, as well as the need for designers and operators to navigate various regulatory factors. The author emphasizes the role of shipowners and designers in evaluating constraints and exploiting technological developments to meet the world's economic demands.
